Subject: Subject area (maths | physics | electronics | NLP | etc)
module_name: this is the .py program in aikif/toolbox
Process_Name: short name, remember full name will include module
parameters: list of parameters that are passed to the function : list | num | str | float | date | blob | filename
return values: list of value(s) returned from function
api_interface: has the function been added to tools with a dummy return value
is_documented: this is a CHECKLIST for djm to make sure all stuff has examples
is_coded: Y or N - can be N with progress percent
is_tested: enter name of the test.py that tests this particular function
is_in_prod: has this been used publically in examples - ie is it properly finished
optimisation_level: how much optimasation - 0 to 10 where 0= returns orig params, 1=simple , 7=good algorithm, 10 proven best method
O_complexity: how complex is this function O(n), O(log n), O^n
category: text category - what SORT of things does this do (should allow for groupings)
usage_when: ??? how to link this to things - ie how does the AI know it should use THIS function
ontology_link: where does this link in onotology tree
